title: Scammers posed as Australian police to steal crypto, authorities warn
summary: Scammers in Australia impersonated police using the government’s ReportCyber system to legitimize their calls and trick victims into handing over crypto.

title: Taiwan premier promises Bitcoin reserve assessment report by end of 2025
summary: Taiwan is exploring the creation of a national Bitcoin Reserve comprising seized coins, much like the US Strategic Bitcoin Reserve established by President Donald Trump in March.

title: Trader torches $3M to punch a $5M hole in Hyperliquid’s vault
summary: A community member called the $3 million wipeout “performance art,” saying that only in crypto do villains torch millions purely for the sake of the plot.

title: Community expects the first US spot XRP ETF to launch on Thursday
summary: Analysts suggest Canary Capital’s spot XRP ETF could go live even as formal approval by the SEC is still technically pending.

title: Tokyo exchange operator eyes crackdown on Bitcoin-holding firms after DAT rout
summary: Metaplanet CEO Simon Gerovich said JPX’s concerns are with companies that feature poor approvals and insisted the critique doesn’t apply to them.

title: How Ripple plans to bridge crypto and Wall Street in its $4B expansion
summary: Ripple bundles custody, prime brokerage, treasury and stablecoins so institutions can operate like banks with crypto rails.

title: Canary Capital files for MOG ETF, boosting the little-known memecoin
summary: The memecoin Mog Coin saw a slight lift in its price on Wednesday after Canary Capital filed to launch an ETF tracking the token.

title: BitFuFu Q3 revenue doubles as rising Bitcoin prices boost miner demand
summary: Cloud miner BitFuFu says third-quarter sales hit $180.7 million as more users rented hashrate and snapped up rigs to ride Bitcoin’s post-halving price surge.

title: US shutdown ends, crypto progress resumes as Trump signs bill
summary: US President Donald Trump signed the bill ending the record 43-day government shutdown and resuming federal operations.

title: Vitalik Buterin champions decentralization in ‘Trustless Manifesto’
summary: Vitalik Buterin and two other Ethereum leaders have written a “Trustless Manifesto” to call on builders to never sacrifice decentralization in pursuit of adoption.
